meanings.definition: A yellow crystalline compound used in the manufacture of dyes and pharmaceuticals.
meanings.sent1: The anthraquinone added vibrant color to the fabric dye.
meanings.sent2: The pharmaceutical company sourced anthraquinone for their new medication.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous chemist accidentally spilled anthraquinone, turning everything yellow.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was an anthraquinone, infusing life with vivid hues.
meanings.sent5: The smell of anthraquinone lingered in the air, a reminder of the dye-making process.
